program.house.name: House
program.house.description: A primarily residential building or dwelling.

program.restaurant.name: Restaurant
program.restaurant.description: A place where people gather to eat and drink.

program.pavilion.name: Pavilion
program.pavilion.description: A small open or semi-open structure for gathering, events, or display.

program.observatory.name: Observatory / Viewing Structure
program.observatory.description: A structure intended for viewing the landscape or sky, often elevated or with framed views.

program.lodging.name: Lodging
program.lodging.description: Accommodation for staying overnight, such as cabins, huts, or small guest rooms.

program.yoga_space.name: Yoga / Wellness Space
program.yoga_space.description: A space for yoga, meditation, or wellness activities, typically open and calm.

program.meditation_space.name: Meditation Space
program.meditation_space.description: A quiet and contemplative space focused on stillness and calm atmosphere.

program.installation.name: Installation / Art Structure
program.installation.description: A primarily expressive or experimental structure, often sculptural or temporary.

program.auditorium.name: Auditorium / Performance Hall
program.auditorium.description: A hall designed for performances, talks, or gatherings with audience seating.

program.school_hall.name: School Hall / Educational Space
program.school_hall.description: A space for school-related activities such as assemblies, learning, or group events.

program.sports_hall.name: Sports Hall
program.sports_hall.description: A covered space for sports or physical activities.

program.community_hall.name: Community Hall
program.community_hall.description: A multi-purpose space for community gatherings, events, and shared activities.

program.bridge.name: Bridge
program.bridge.description: A structure that spans across an obstacle such as water or terrain for circulation.

program.lounge.name: Lounge / Relaxation Area
program.lounge.description: An informal area for sitting, relaxing, and social interaction.

program.detail_reference.name: Detail Reference
program.detail_reference.description: An image focused on a specific joint or structural fragment for reference, not a full building.

view.exterior.name: Exterior View
view.exterior.description: The viewpoint is primarily from outside the building or structure.

view.interior.name: Interior View
view.interior.description: The viewpoint is primarily from inside the building or under the roof.

binding.rattan.name: Rattan Binding
binding.rattan.description: Connections tied using rattan or similar natural fiber.

binding.bundle.name: Bundle Binding
binding.bundle.description: Multiple bamboo culms tied together into a bundle at the joint.

binding.square_lash.name: Square Lashing
binding.square_lash.description: Orthogonal lashing pattern that wraps around two members crossing at right angles.

cutmiter.fishmouth.name: Fishmouth Cut
cutmiter.fishmouth.description: A concave saddle-shaped cut that allows a bamboo culm to sit snugly onto another round member.

cutmiter.peg_through.name: Peg-Through Cut
cutmiter.peg_through.description: Cuts or drillings made to allow pegs or dowels to pass through bamboo members.

mechanical.through_bolt.name: Through-Bolt Connection
mechanical.through_bolt.description: A mechanical joint where a bolt passes through one or more members and is locked with a nut.

mechanical.rod.name: Rod Connection
mechanical.rod.description: Connections using metal rods, often threaded, embedded or passing through bamboo.

mechanical.clamp.name: Clamp Connection
mechanical.clamp.description: Mechanical clamps or collars gripping the bamboo without fully penetrating it.

mechanical.shoe.name: Base Shoe / Footing
mechanical.shoe.description: A base component that holds bamboo columns at the foundation, often metal.

node.steel_hub.name: Steel Hub Node
node.steel_hub.description: A central steel node or hub that gathers and connects multiple bamboo members.

render_style.photoreal.name: Photorealistic
render_style.photoreal.description: Images that look like real photographs with natural lighting and materials.

render_style.mass_model.name: Mass Model / Concept Model
render_style.mass_model.description: Abstract or simplified representation focusing on massing and form rather than details.

frame.profile_rectilinear.name: Rectilinear Frame Profile
frame.profile_rectilinear.description: Frames composed mostly of straight, orthogonal members.

frame.profile_arch.name: Arched Frame Profile
frame.profile_arch.description: Frames with a curved or arched elevation profile.

truss.space.name: Space Truss / Space Frame
truss.space.description: A three-dimensional triangulated system carrying loads in multiple directions.

truss.planar.name: Planar Truss
truss.planar.description: A flat, typically vertical or sloping triangulated truss working in one main plane.

reciprocal.tower.name: Reciprocal Tower
reciprocal.tower.description: A vertical or tower-like configuration of reciprocal members supporting each other.

reciprocal.dome.name: Reciprocal Dome
reciprocal.dome.description: A dome-shaped reciprocal system forming a self-supporting roof or shell.

bamboo.apus.name: Bamboo Apus
bamboo.apus.description: Images primarily using or referencing bamboo apus species.

bamboo.wulung.name: Bamboo Wulung
bamboo.wulung.description: Images primarily using or referencing bamboo wulung species.
